snippet.title: The Last Bloom Trailer
snippet.description:
🌸 The Last Bloom will be available on March 27, 2025.🌸

👉 Add it to your Steam Wishlist here:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3568780/The_Last_Bloom/

A side-scrolling adventure game blending adorable visuals and classic controls 🎮, inspired by the legendary Game Boy Advance!

🐾 Take on the role of Fruend, a clever dog helping Margarete, a blind girl, safely navigate her journey to a neighbor’s house. Use your bark to assist her in various ways. For example, if you encounter a closed door, bark to call Margarete to open it for you—because dogs can’t open doors, after all! 🐶
